channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- JSM file_get_contents() Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- JSM file_get_contents() Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2023-6991|2024-08-02T08:50:06.847Z -- unknown -- jsm%20file_get_contents%28%29%20shortcode
item.description: The JSM file_get_contents() Shortcode WordPress plugin before 2.7.1 does not validate one of its shortcode's parameters before making a request to it, which could allow users with contributor role and above to perform SSRF attacks.
